verses.verse: And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H954>delayed<s%> to come <S%H3381>down<s%> out of the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, the <S%H5971>people<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H6965>Up<s%>, <S%H6213>make<s%> us <S%H430>gods<s%>, which shall <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us; for as for this <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5927>brought<s%> us up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, we <S%H3045>wot<s%> not what is become of him.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Break <S%H6561>off<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>earrings<s%>, which are in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of your <S%H802>wives<s%>, of your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and of your <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> them unto me.
And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> brake <S%H6561>off<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>earrings<s%> which were in their <S%H241>ears<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>.

And he <S%H3947>received<s%> them at their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H6696>fashioned<s%> it with a graving <S%H2747>tool<s%>, after he had <S%H6213>made<s%> it a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf<s%>: and they <S%H559>said<s%>, These be thy <S%H430>gods<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which <S%H5927>brought<s%> thee up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> it; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> made <S%H7121>proclamation<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, To <S%H4279>morrow<s%> is a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And they rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, and <S%H5066>brought<s%> peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> down to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H6711>play<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, get thee <S%H3381>down<s%>; for thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, which thou <S%H5927>broughtest<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> themselves:

They have <S%H5493>turned<s%> aside <S%H4118>quickly<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them: they have <S%H6213>made<s%> them a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf<s%>, and have <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> it, and have <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> thereunto, and <S%H559>said<s%>, These be thy <S%H430>gods<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which have brought thee <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>, and, behold, it is a <S%H7186>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H6203><s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>:

Now therefore let me <S%H3240>alone<s%>, that my <S%H639>wrath<s%> may wax <S%H2734>hot<s%> against them, and that I may <S%H3615>consume<s%> them: and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> of thee a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2470>besought<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, why doth thy <S%H639>wrath<s%> wax <S%H2734>hot<s%> against thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, which thou hast brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%>, and with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>? the LORD: Heb. the face of the LORD

Wherefore should the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, For <S%H7451>mischief<s%> did he <S%H3318>bring<s%> them out, to <S%H2026>slay<s%> them in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and to <S%H3615>consume<s%> them from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>? <S%H7725>Turn<s%> from thy <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%>, and <S%H5162>repent<s%> of this <S%H7451>evil<s%> against thy <S%H5971>people<s%>.

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, to whom thou <S%H7650>swarest<s%> by thine own self, and <S%H1696>saidst<s%> unto them, I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and all this <S%H776>land<s%> that I have <S%H559>spoken<s%> of will I <S%H5414>give<s%> unto your <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and they shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> it for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> which he <S%H1696>thought<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%>, and went <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> were in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: the <S%H3871>tables<s%> were <S%H3789>written<s%> on <S%H8147>both<s%> their <S%H5676>sides<s%>; on the one side and on the other were they <S%H3789>written<s%>.

And the <S%H3871>tables<s%> were the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and the <S%H4385>writing<s%> was the <S%H4385>writing<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H2801>graven<s%> upon the <S%H3871>tables<s%>.

And when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> as they <S%H7452>shouted<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, There is a <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, It is not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that <S%H6030>shout<s%> for <S%H1369>mastery<s%>, neither is it the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that <S%H6030>cry<s%> for being <S%H2476>overcome<s%>: but the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of them that <S%H6031>sing<s%> do I <S%H8085>hear<s%>. being: Heb. weakness

And it came to pass, as soon as he came <S%H7126>nigh<s%> unto the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, that he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%>, and the <S%H4246>dancing<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> waxed <S%H2734>hot<s%>, and he <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H3871>tables<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and <S%H7665>brake<s%> them <S%H8478>beneath<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> which they had <S%H6213>made<s%>, and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> it in the <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H2912>ground<s%> it to <S%H1854>powder<s%>, and <S%H2219>strawed<s%> it <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%>, and made the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> of it.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, What <S%H6213>did<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> unto thee, that thou hast <S%H935>brought<s%> so <S%H1419>great<s%> a <S%H2401>sin<s%> upon them?

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let not the <S%H639>anger<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> wax <S%H2734>hot<s%>: thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that they are set on <S%H7451>mischief<s%>.

For they <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H6213>Make<s%> us <S%H430>gods<s%>, which shall <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us: for as for this <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, the <S%H376>man<s%> that brought us <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, we <S%H3045>wot<s%> not what is become of him.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Whosoever hath any <S%H2091>gold<s%>, let them <S%H6561>break<s%> it off. So they <S%H5414>gave<s%> it me: then I <S%H7993>cast<s%> it into the <S%H784>fire<s%>, and there came <S%H3318>out<s%> this <S%H5695>calf<s%>.

And when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6544>naked<s%>; (for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> had made them <S%H6544>naked<s%> unto their <S%H8103>shame<s%> among their <S%H6965>enemies<s%>:) their enemies: Heb. those that rose up against them

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Who is on the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> side? let him come unto me. And all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> themselves together unto him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H7760>Put<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> by his <S%H3409>side<s%>, and <S%H5674>go<s%> in and <S%H7725>out<s%> from <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H8179>gate<s%> throughout the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and <S%H2026>slay<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7453>companion<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7138>neighbour<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>: and there <S%H5307>fell<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> about <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

For <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%>, Consecrate <S%H4390>yourselves<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H3588>even<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> upon his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and upon his <S%H251>brother<s%>; that he may <S%H5414>bestow<s%> upon you a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>. For Moses: or, And Moses said, Consecrate yourselves to day to the LORD, because every man hath been against his brother, etc Consecrate: Heb. Fill your hands

And it came to pass on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>, that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, Ye have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin<s%>: and now I will go <S%H5927>up<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; <S%H194>peradventure<s%> I shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> your <S%H2403>sin<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H577>Oh<s%>, this <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin<s%>, and have <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
Yet now, if thou wilt <S%H5375>forgive<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%>--; and if not, <S%H4229>blot<s%> me, I pray thee, out of thy <S%H5612>book<s%> which thou hast <S%H3789>written<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H834>Whosoever<s%> hath <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against me, him will I blot <S%H4229>out<s%> of my <S%H5612>book<s%>.

Therefore now <S%H3212>go<s%>, <S%H5148>lead<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the place of which I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto thee: behold, mine <S%H4397>Angel<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: nevertheless in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H6485>visit<s%> I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%> upon them.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5062>plagued<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H834>because<s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%>, <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%>.
